detail_desc: Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high waist, gently flared legs and raw edges.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with jersey-lined, opening cups with removable inserts. Adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Padded gilet in woven fabric with a sheen. Appliqué at the top, a lined drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric and a small, ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a ribbed hem. Lined.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable fabric shoulder strap. One zipped outer compartment and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm, height 12.5 cm, width 19 cm.
Knee-length wrapover skirt in a crêpe weave with a regular waist, concealed press-stud and ties at one side and an asymmetric, flounced hem. Unlined.
Grosgrain-covered Alice band with emojis on top.
Alice bands in various designs. One in padded satin with sparkly stone decorations. Two in thin metal, one of which is covered in fabric and decorated with plastic beads and sparkly stone chains.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in jersey. Round-necked T-shirt with a small print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless top in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a tie detail at the front of the hem.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Small appliqué on one sleeve, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with flatlock seams. Long balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a motif.
Pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey covered elastication at the waist and hole embroidery at the hems.
Fine-knit dress with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.

Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets at the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, a frill-trimmed yoke at the back and an embroidered back section in woven fabric.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wellingtons with print motifs and appliqués. Loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a racer back and cut-out section at the back.
High-waisted, 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Fitted jersey dress with long, lace raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in cotton piqué with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in checked flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hobo bag in imitation patent leather with a handle, zip at the top and a detachable shoulder strap. One inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining. Depth 10 cm. Width 34 cm. Height 34 cm.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with concealed vertical elastication down the front for a draped effect. Stand-up collar, long sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Rib-knit polo-neck collar with a fine-knit hem.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and a slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
V-neck top in satin with lace trims, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.
Shaping. 5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist with a zip fly and button.
Sports socks in fine-knit, fast-drying functional yarn with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front, welt side pockets and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Trims and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Jersey dress with a motif, long sleeves, a seam at the hip and gathered skirt.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam with narrow elastication at the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
A-line dress in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
SUPREME STRETCH. 5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim for optimal comfort with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and zip fly and button.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend.
Set with two metal hair clips with butterfly appliqués and four small hair elastics without metal clips. Length of hair clips 4.5 cm.

Padded parka with a concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and a hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, flap front pockets with press-studs and a zipped inner pocket. Partially concealed elastic tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the back of the waist. Lined.
Make-up bag in semi-transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size approx. 9x9.5x17.5 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit.
Push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cap with embroidery on the front, a contrasting colour cotton twill peak and concealed elastication at the back. Lined.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Set with a long-sleeved hooded jacket and pair of trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, two-part kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hair elastics in a crêpe weave.
Hat in a soft fine knit with a print motif.

Set with two T-shirts and two pairs of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirts with narrow ribbing around the neckline and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with long sleeves and a peplum at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with a gentle, lace-trimmed V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Leather sandals with padded, wrapover straps. Leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Flared skirt in textured, double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams. Unlined.
Flared skirt in sequined mesh with a satin-covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket, hood with embroidery and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama shorts in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and ties at the sides and a gently flared, tiered skirt. Sewn-in underdress in jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, and short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups.
Vest top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.

LIMITED EDITION. Long, jacquard-weave kaftan in a viscose and cotton blend with a glittery thread pattern in a wide fit. Grandad collar, opening at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, 3/4-length sleeves and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dolman sleeves.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend a round neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and flap leg pockets.
